original: Källoff, Allan, rådman, Borås, f. 22/ 7/06 i Jönköp. av dir. William Wennberg o. Annie Hultgren. G. 36 m. Majken Rahm. Barm: Peter f. 41, Lena 44, Tom 46. — Stud:ex. i Jönköp. 24, jur. kand. i Lund 31. Tingstjg. i Vättle, Ale o. KulMngs doms. 31-35, e. o. not. i Göta hovr. 35, e. fiskal där 35, sekr. i Nordals, Sundals o. Valbo doms. 36 o. i Sunnervikens doms. 37-39i, rå dm. i Borås sed. 39, förste b rott-m:rådman. Ordf. i tax:nd i Borås o. i vägnd samt sekr. i byggn :ndn i Borås, v. ordf. i aivtailsmd f. fångv:-kolon. Olle stad.
translated: Källoff, Allan, magistrate, Borås, b. 22/7/06 in Jönköping, son of director William Wennberg and Annie Hultgren. Married in 1936 to Majken Rahm. Children: Peter b. 1941, Lena b. 1944, Tom b. 1946. Completed secondary education in Jönköping in 1924, graduated with a law degree in Lund in 1931. Served as a judicial clerk in Vättle, Ale, and Kungälv districts from 1931 to 1935, acting notary public in Göta Court of Appeal in 1935, associate judge there in 1935, secretary in Nordals, Sundals, and Valbo districts in 1936, and in Sunnerkikens district from 1937 to 1939. Appointed magistrate in Borås in 1939, serving as the chief criminal magistrate. Chairman of the tax board in Borås, as well as the road board, and secretary of the construction committee in Borås. Vice chairman of the board of directors for the prison colony in Ollestad.

memberships.roleName: Vice Chairman of the Board of Directors
